thread.title: Vandals destroy historic Terlingua ghost town ruins
thread.title_full: Vandals destroy historic Terlingua ghost town ruins

author: Daniela Sternitzky-Di Napoli, Houston Chroncle
title: Vandals destroy historic Terlingua ghost town ruins
text: Vandals destroy historic Terlingua ghost town ruins There is a $1,000 reward being offered for any information. Daniela Sternitzky-Di Napoli, Houston Chroncle Published 9:42 am, Tuesday, February 21, 2017 Image 1 of / 24 Close Image 1 of 24 Historic stone ruins in the small town of Terlingua, Texas have been reduced to piles on rubble after vandals destroyed the structures.>>KEEP GOING TO SEE OTHER SCENES FROM THE TEXAS GHOST TOWN. Historic stone ruins in the small town of Terlingua, Texas have been reduced to piles on rubble after vandals destroyed the structures.>>KEEP GOING TO SEE OTHER SCENES FROM THE TEXAS GHOST TOWN. Image 2 of 24 Image 3 of 24 Adobe remains located in Terlingua Ghost Town, South West Texas, near Big Bend National Park, Texas, United States.
